item.description:
Our friend and fellow photographer, Ron Rosenstock, is having a solo show at the Worcester Art Museum! You may remember Ron from his many lectures around the area and it's a great honor to see him in the museum. Come celebrate his success with us at the Art Museum opening reception. Bring your friends!

 

THURSDAY, DEC 15
Museum open from 11am-8pm

AFTER HOURS 3rd Thursdays and
Exhibition Opening: Hymn to the Earth:
Photographs by Ron Rosenstock
5:30-8pm

 

Music: Songs for Ceilidh (Celtic with a kick)

Free with Museum admission. Admission is $14.00 or free to members.

Hey Guys - Update on this... I called the museum when I saw this number of folks interested in going to the show- I got us a discounted group rate of 12.00 per person! You have to say you are member of this meetup group in order to get it. Any questions have them call me that night I will be there! 774-239-   0215
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting inside the Museum from the Side Entrance

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Worcester Art Museum: Hymn to the Earth: Photographs by Ron Rosenstock
